trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Hazlet
There were no other sightings in Hazlet on or around May 1st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside walking the dog in my backyard and I heard a noise similiar to the sound a blower makes on a high performance engine, I looked up and this craft was hovering over me about 300 feet in the sky. My dog was now cowering at my feet, and I felt like a warm beam of light go across my face. I picked up my dog and began to back away the craft went higher in the sky maybe another 300 feet I used the treeline to approximate the hieght. I continued about 100 feet back to my home ran inside to get my camera when I came back out it was gone
Summary: triple chevron shaped object with lights on all points
